Package org.svvrl.goal.core.util

Class ClassSelector

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.util.ClassSelector
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Comparator<java.lang.Class<?>>
public class ClassSelector
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Comparator<java.lang.Class<?>>
ClassSelector provides methods for selecting a class that is closest to a specified object in the class hierarchy.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • select

      public static java.lang.Class<?> select​(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<?>> cs, java.lang.Object obj)
      Selects a class that is closest to a specified object in the class hierarchy from a collection of classes.
      Parameters:

      obj - an object
